question.title: VSCode not recognising spring boot 3 project
question.body:
I'm using Vscode with Java plugins. I used sdkman to install Java. I started a new project with Spring Initializer, using Java 21 and Gradle. My JAVA_HOME is following .sdkman/candidates/java/current My java version in terminal is 21 When I am opening Java: Configure Java Runtime option in vscode i am getting following message There is no Java projects opened in the current workspace. Please try to reload the page or open a Java project. I am using vim extension for vscode which I tried disabling and restarting according to this answer

but still getting the same error
